function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Construction activities generating CO2 emissions and waste production","Impact":"Increased air pollution, greenhouse gas emissions, and negative impact on health","Mitigation":"Adopting sustainable construction practices and technologies to reduce emissions and waste","Technologies":"Green building materials, energy-efficient systems, waste management solutions","People":"Construction workers, residents in the surrounding area","Owner":"Construction companies, government regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Lack of sustainability in residential buildings","Impact":"Negative impact on air quality, health outcomes, and environmental preservation","Mitigation":"Implementation of sustainable design and construction practices, use of green building certification systems","Technologies":"LEED, CASBEE, BREEAM, WELL Building Standard","People":"Construction companies, designers, residents","Owner":"Building developers, government agencies"},{"Description":"Increased demand for construction materials and resources","Impact":"Depletion of natural resources, environmental degradation, and increased carbon footprint","Mitigation":"Adoption of sustainable building materials, recycling and reuse of resources, energy-efficient construction practices","Technologies":"Recycled materials, sustainable wood products, renewable energy systems","People":"Construction industry, environmental organizations","Owner":"Construction companies, government bodies"}]}
